page.title: 03ATTITUDES
page.content: When questioned some people said that they thought that Capital Punishment should be kept only for special circumstances where force or violence has been used. Some people owned a video,and said that they did not use it too much,but it was nice to have it there when they wanted to record a good film. We also asked people what they thought about computers, and the main reply was that they were very useful for business and in schools, but the way that Home Computers were used for games and nothing else was obviously wrong. Almost everyone had a Television and said that they enjoyed watching it, but they found that it could sometimes be unsociable.
